title: Manikanakkil Sirithu Lyrics Raja Pokkiri Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Manikanakkil Sirithu (Madurai Version)
Singers: Vijay Yesudas, Janaki Iyer

Movie : Raja Pokkiri Raja
Music Director : Jassie Gift
Lyrics : Viveka  

Manikanakkil Sirikum penne 
mayakka vandhal, naan unakku vendi
Sirikum pennal sila pala nimidam
sidhaindhu ponaar,en madhura paandi

Unnakena pirandhavana?
ennai unarkira tharunam idhu
Thani thani rasanai illai
ini namakulle thadaigal yedhu

Azhagiye adi aethirinil unnai
kaanum kangal baakiyam seithadhu

Manikanakkil Sirikum penne ...

Unnidam pesinaal 
mani mullum odudhey
unnai naan pirigayil 
nodi mullum thengudhey

Kannile  kannile 
garvangalum pookuthey
kadhalil vazhvadhe 
thavamaaga thondrudhey

Aatru mannai thondugayil
ootru vandhu kai ninikum
Aasai nenjai thondugayil
undha vaasam angirukum

Enna aanaalum unnai en nenju
oru nodi marapathillai

Manikanakkil Sirikum penne ...

Un peyar solliye 
udhadu thazhumbaandadhu
Unviral theenduma
udal muzhudhum aengudhu

Solladhu solvadhu
yaavum marandhodudhu 
Minmini poochigal 
maeni engum maeyidhu

Palli pogum pillaiena
thulli naanum odukiren
Ullam ennum koviliniley
Unnai vaithu paadukiren

Munnum kaanaadha pinnum kaanaadha
paravasam naan adaindhaen

Manikanakkil Sirikum pennaal
mayakka vandhaar,en madhura paandi
Sirikum pennai sila pala nimidam
sidhaindhu ponen,naan unnaku vendi

Unnakena pirandhavana?
ennai unarkira tharunam idhu
Thani thani rasanai illai
ini namakulle thadaigal yedhu

Azhagiye adi aethirinil unnai
kaanum kangal baakiyam seithadhu

seo.title: Manikanakkil Sirithu Lyrics Raja Pokkiri Raja Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Manikanakkil Sirithu Lyrics Raja Pokkiri Raja Song Lyrics from Raja Pokkiri Raja. Read the lyrics penned by Viveka and composed by Jassie Gift and sung by Janani Iyer. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Viveka, Raja Pokkiri Raja, Jassie Gift, Janani Iyer, Vijay Yesudas, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
